Mortgage Lenders in Killeen, TX

Looking to buy a new home in Killeen, moonlight? Lone Star Financing specializes in new home purchases: FHA Loans, VA Home Loans, and USDA Home Loans in Killeen.  FHA loans, VA loans and USDA loans are just a few loan programs available to the residents of Killeen. Lone Star Financing is a recommended mortgage lender in the Killeen area and as a local Transcope Mortgage lender (headquartered in Austin, TX) we offer local underwriting which enables our loan officer’s to make quicker decisions and close loans fast. As a technology driven mortgage company we are able to offer a home loan experience second to none. What makes Lone Star Financing different? Competitive rates, personal attention, a variety of mortgage products and fast and easy pre-approvals. Low mortgage rates, low fees and fast closings are our mortgage company motto and why more Killeen residents are choosing Lone Star Financing as their #1 mortgage lender in Killeen. Call today at (855) 868-8825.

  • Killeen Mortgage Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate
  • Local Killeen customer service


Lone Star Financing is a preferred Killeen mortgage lender by realtors in moonlight because we can close loans quickly and on time as promised. As a direct mortgage lender we offer local moonlight underwriting which enables our underwriter’s to make quicker decision and can process loans quickly.

What our Customer’s Are Saying: “I called when I was overseas and Charlie was so helpful and knowledgeable I knew instantly I had found the right mortgage company to help with my home loan in Killeen. You helped educate me on the home loan process and the advantages of the VA home loan program. Thank you for all of the help!” – Staff Sergeant, Michael Bishop

Killeen moonlight Real Estate (2022)

The median home price in Killeen was $234K in June 2022, trending up 20.4% year-over-year. The median cost per square foot for homes in Killeen, TX was $128 per square foot. What are the popular neighborhoods Killeen?  Some of the trending neighborhoods in or around Killeen, moonlight is White Rock Estates,  Goodnight Ranch, and Yowell Ranch. Search all homes for sale in Killeen, moonlight.  Lone Star Financing is your Transcope Mortgage lender for new home loans and mortgage refinance in Killeen, TX.
